metadata.title: CVE-2023-2938 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Picture In Picture in Google Chrome priorto 114.0.5735.90 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to spoof the contents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
